title: (1) View along the Mosel Front at Coblenz, Looking Downstream towards Ehrenbreitstein past the St Florinskirche Towers and Alte Burg; (2) Church and Hills (?Sinzig); (3) Ehrenbreitstein, from the Confluence of the Rhine and the Mosel
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
